text: Ingrid of Sweden (Ingrid Victoria Sofia Louise Margareta; 28 March 1910 â€“ 7 November 2000) was Queen of Denmark from 1947 until 1972 as the wife of King Frederick IX. She was also a paternal aunt of the present Swedish monarch, King Carl XVI Gustaf. ==Other websites== * Queen Ingrid at the website of the Royal Danish Collection at Amalienborg Palace * Queen Ingrid Exhibition at the Royal Danish Collection at Amalienborg Palace * Obituary in The Telegraph, 8 November 2000 Category:1910 births Category:2000 deaths Category:People from Stockholm Category:Kings and Queens of Denmark Category:Kings and Queens consort Category:Swedish princesses
title: Ingrid of Sweden
